results.title: Addressing Metabolic Comorbidity in Individuals With Intellectual and Developmental Disability on Antipsychotics: A Clinical Case Series.
results.text_hl: There is currently a lack of literature on effective treatment options for antipsychotic-induced @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic abnormalities@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_disc_disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535531 @@@IDD@@@. This case series reports on the clinical use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_disc_disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535531 @@@IDD@@@ on antipsychotics.

citations.NLM: Stogios N, Hahn MK, Lunsky Y, Desarkar P, Agarwal SM. Addressing Metabolic Comorbidity in Individuals With Intellectual and Developmental Disability on Antipsychotics: A Clinical Case Series. J Clin Psychopharmacol. 2023 Jan-Feb 01;43(1):60-63. PMID: 36394921
